explains: n. 平等主义者；平等主义

sentences.en: I still believe in the notion of an egalitarian society.
sentences.cn: 我仍然相信平等主义社会的理念。

sentences.en: Jacksonian America was not a fluid, egalitarian society where individual wealth and poverty were ephemeral conditions.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊时代的美国不是一个流动的、平等的社会，个人的财富和贫穷都是短暂的。
